name: Kingfisher plc
bossPosition: Group Director of Government Affairs & Communities
membership: British Retail Consortium; CBI (UK); AFEP; FMB (France); Leviatan; Pohid (Poland); APED (Portugal); ADFB (Spain); EDRA; Eurocommerce (EU)
goal:
Kingfisher plc is a home improvement company with over 1,100 stores in 10 countries across Europe. We employ 74,000 people and nearly six million customers shop in our stores and through our websites every week.

Our ambition: We want to create good homes by making home improvement accessible for everyone.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Timber Review; Digital Single Market; Unfair Trading Practices Directive; Internal Single Market - rights of establishment; Interchange Fee Regulations; Circular Economy; Energy efficiency proposals; Jobs agenda - Youth Employment, Older Workers; Consumer interests; Ciompetition Policy as it affects any M&A activity
